titles.title: A bill to require the Secretary of Transportation to initiate a rulemaking proceeding to enable any airport to change its location identifier assigned to such airport by the Federal Aviation Administration.

action.text: Read twice and referred to the Committee on Commerce.

bill.summary: 5/25/1988--Introduced. Directs the Secretary of Transportation to initiate a rulemaking proceeding to authorize any airport to change, at its discretion, the location identifier assigned to it by the Federal Aviation Administration. Precludes any such change from taking effect within the 36-month period following the issuance of such a rule.
